= Introduction =

A consistent code style goes a long way. This page documents some of the code style choices for the Ubiquity XForms library.

= Details =

For all new !JavaScript code, the code style guidelines are:

 * Use guidelines described in detail in Douglas Crockford's book "!JavaScript: The Good Parts" (ISBN 10: 0-596-51774-2 | ISBN 13: 9780596517748)

 * A shorter online version of the code guidelines is at http://javascript.crockford.com/code.html

 * Using [http://www.jslint.com/ JSLint] for !JavaScript verification is recommended

 * Use 4 spaces for indentation (which you already know if you read the above :-)
